    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[Author_Id], [a].[Author_Name], [a].[Biography], [a].[Created_At], [a].[Created_By], [a].[Updated_At], [a].[Updated_By]
    FROM [Authors] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Author_Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [t].[Author_Id] = [b].[Author_Id]
ORDER BY [t].[Author_Id]

    WHERE [a].[Author_Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [t].[Author_Id] = [b].[Author_Id]
ORDER BY [t].[Author_Id]

2024-08-12 16:35:05.718 +05:30 [DBG] Created DbCommand for 'ExecuteReader' (3ms).

2024-08-12 16:35:05.725 +05:30 [DBG] Executing DbCommand [Parameters=[@__id_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [t].[Author_Id], [t].[Author_Name], [t].[Biography], [t].[Created_At], [t].[Created_By], [t].[Updated_At], [t].[Updated_By], [b].[Id], [b].[Author_Id], [b].[Created_At], [b].[Created_By], [b].[Description], [b].[Genre_Id], [b].[Price], [b].[Publication_Date], [b].[Title], [b].[Updated_At], [b].[Updated_By]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(1) [a].[Author_Id], [a].[Author_Name], [a].[Biography], [a].[Created_At], [a].[Created_By], [a].[Updated_At], [a].[Updated_By]
    FROM [Authors] AS [a]
    WHERE [a].[Author_Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [t].[Author_Id] = [b].[Author_Id]
ORDER BY [t].[Author_Id]

        LEFT JOIN Books AS b ON g.Genre_Id == b.Genre_Id
        ORDER BY g.Genre_Id ASC),
